game.name: Walk of Life
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Walk of Life is a fast-paced, satirical life simulator where you scramble to get a job, earn a degree, pay rent, and beat your friends before everything falls apart.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Walk of Life is a fast-paced, satirical life simulator where you scramble to get a job, earn a degree, pay rent, and beat your friends before everything falls apart.

reviewHighlights.text: Long time fan of "No Time to Relax" here.... I have played this game for a total of 45 hours already. I have played online games, and all the availabl...
Just played a couple of hours with my GF, greeeat game to spend some time, hope to see updates soon so we can replay it over and over.
